success.PARTIAL_PAYMENT_BODY: You need to pay {remaining} to complete your purchase.
success.NO_ORDERS_FOUND: No card purchase orders found for this user
success.PAYMENT_PROCESSED_SUCCESS: Card purchase order payment successfully processed
